articles.author: Tim De Chant
articles.title: Google signed a deal to power data centers with nuclear micro-reactors from Kairos — but the 2030 timeline is very optimistic - TechCrunch
articles.description: With the deal, Google joins Microsoft and Amazon in turning to nuclear power to satiate its thirst for electricity.
articles.content: Google announced today that it has signed a deal with nuclear startup Kairos Power to build seven small reactors to supply electricity to its data centers. The agreement promises to add around 500 me… [+3140 chars]

articles.author: Brody Ford
articles.title: Adobe Launches AI Video Generator in Race With OpenAI, Meta - Bloomberg
articles.description: Adobe Inc. unveiled artificial intelligence tools that can create and modify videos, joining Big Tech companies and startups in trying to capitalize on demand for the emerging technology.
articles.content:
